query:
SELECT r.id, r.teamId, r.month, r.year, t.teamName 
FROM reports r 
JOIN fm_teams t ON r.teamId = t.id 
WHERE t.teamName = 'Team Alpha';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3siEZZHP6GxHny4.362c1c443853 --database iWK4WHPw4uyWQ7HVMxhuBF --execute SELECT r.id, r.teamId, r.month, r.year, t.teamName 
FROM reports r 
JOIN fm_teams t ON r.teamId = t.id 
WHERE t.teamName = 'Team Alpha';
